description:
In this breakthrough class we'll cover how to turn a simple "list" article into almost a dozen different traffic "magnets" to drive targeted visitors to your website or blog (or both)!

You can use these techniques to leverage articles into multiple marketing tools, get more traffic to your website, and even multiply your efforts by hiring others to do some or all of it for you!

Heck, I even show you how to turn your article into a podcast (and not make any changes to your website)!

In fact, here's just a sample of what we cover on this exciting class:

  • How to turn your article into a podcast...
  • How to turn your article into multiple videos...
  • How to leverage your article on Pinterest...
  • How to leverage that article into an entire webinar...
  • ... and much, MUCH More!

Don't miss this class that will show you how to get maximum marketing results from just a single article (and YOU don't even have to write the article yourself!).

If you want to make money with your writing as an author or freelance writer, this class will teach you techniques that put your marketing efforts on steroids.

Every minute you wait is another moment that you're missing out on the powerful techniques you'll learn in this class to drive the traffic and visitors you need to explode your business.
title: Beyond Article Marketing: 10 Marketing Magnets in 1 Article
